item.description:
Making and keeping promises to yourself leads to trust in all your choices. Compromising yourself puts you at great risk.

Today, there is a lot of pressure to not put yourself first; to not keep the promises you’ve made to yourself. This often causes you to put others needs before your own. In doing so, you may treat others better than yourself or worse you begin to lose your sense of self as you compromise your integrity. Your integrity and personal code of honor comes from trust in yourself. The stronger you trust in yourself, the easier it is to make the choices that lead to well-being.

Become aware:

  • Identify all your lifetime promises.
  • Understand their role in your daily life.
  • Differentiate between promises and rules.
  • Re-prioritize, adjust and learn to eliminate your promises.
  • Discover that your promises affect your whole being.

Workshop details:

  • When: Friday, June 29th
  • Time: 7pm
  • Price: $15.00
  • What to bring:  You! And  all are welcome!
Great tea will be provided!  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Presenter: Susan Bradshaw.

Susan T. Bradshaw is a Reiki  Practitioner and Teacher. She started learning and practicing energy work several years ago. Susan is constantly furthering her knowledge through practicing , researching and studying various types of holistic energy healing. She offers her services in Jin Shin Jyutsu, Chakra Balancing, Numerology & Astrology, Spiritual Counseling and Tarot Reading.
item.name: Promises, Promises
